Ruby on Rails Development

OUR EXPERTISE

CUSTOM ROR SOLUTIONS

CodeCrux excels at developing custom Rails-based solutions within projects that enjoy minimized timelines and reduced costs. We deliver unbeatable startup- and enterprise-grade results faster, all thanks to Rails’ out-of-the-box versatility.

CODE AUDIT AND QA

Our team of QA engineers performs code audit, checking it for maintainability and scalability problems, and takes a deep dive into security by verifying every single gem being used in the application to confirm any outstanding issues.

MVP DEVELOPMENT

Our services span the delivery of a Rails-based minimum viable product that guarantees the highest ratio of return on investment versus risk, effectively allowing you to validate your business idea against a user base.

MAINTENANCE AND SUPPORT

We render affordable & reliable post-delivery Rails-based application support and maintenance services, ensuring that the framework and your apps’ gems remain up-to-date & keeping your solution stable and secure 24/7.

Contact CodeCrux
